verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to her who is <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> and <S%H1351>defiled,<s%> The <S%H3238>tyrannical<s%> <S%H5892>city!<s%>

She <S%H8085>heeded<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6963>voice;<s%> She <S%H3947>accepted<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4148>instruction.<s%> She did not <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> She did not <S%H7126>draw<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to her <S%H430>God.<s%>

Her <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> her are <S%H7580>roaring<s%> <S%H738>lions,<s%> Her <S%H8199>judges<s%> are <S%H2061>wolves<s%> at <S%H6153>evening;<s%> They <S%H9079>leave<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> for the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

Her <S%H5030>prophets<s%> are <S%H6348>reckless,<s%> <S%H900>treacherous<s%> <S%H376>men;<s%> Her <S%H3548>priests<s%> have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%> They have <S%H2554>done<s%> <S%H2554>violence<s%> to the <S%H8451>law.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> her; He will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H9390>injustice.<s%> <S%H1242>Every<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> He <S%H5414>brings<s%> His <S%H4941>justice<s%> to <S%H216>light;<s%> He does not <S%H5737>fail.<s%> But the <S%H5767>unjust<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1322>shame.<s%>

"I have <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H1471>nations;<s%> Their <S%H6438>corner<s%> <S%H6438>towers<s%> are in <S%H8074>ruins.<s%> I have <S%H2717>made<s%> their <S%H2351>streets<s%> <S%H2717>desolate,<s%> With <S%H1097>no<s%> <S%H1097>one<s%> <S%H5674>passing<s%> by; Their <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H9470>laid<s%> <S%H9470>waste,<s%> <S%H4480>Without<s%> <S%H1097><s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H369><s%> an <S%H3427>inhabitant.<s%>

"I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>'Surely<s%> you will <S%H3372>revere<s%> Me, <S%H3947>Accept<s%> <S%H4148>instruction.<s%>' So her <S%H4583>dwelling<s%> will not be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> [According to] <S%H3605>all<s%> that I have <S%H6485>appointed<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> her. But they were <S%H7925>eager<s%> to <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5949>deeds.<s%>

<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H2442>wait<s%> for Me," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "For the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H6965>rise<s%> up to the <S%H5706>prey.<s%> <S%H3588>Indeed,<s%> My <S%H4941>decision<s%> is to <S%H622>gather<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> To <S%H6908>assemble<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms,<s%> To <S%H8210>pour<s%> out on them My <S%H2195>indignation,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> My <S%H2740>burning<s%> <S%H639>anger;<s%> For <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> will be <S%H398>devoured<s%> By the <S%H784>fire<s%> of My <S%H7068>zeal.<s%>

"For <S%H227>then<s%> I will <S%H2015>give<s%> to the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H1305>purified<s%> <S%H8193>lips,<s%> That <S%H3605>all<s%> of them may <S%H7121>call<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> To <S%H5647>serve<s%> Him <S%H7926>shoulder<s%> to <S%H7926>shoulder.<s%>
"From <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> My <S%H9442>worshipers,<s%> My <S%H1323>dispersed<s%> <S%H6327><s%> ones, Will <S%H2986>bring<s%> My <S%H4503>offerings.<s%>

"In that <S%H3117>day<s%> you will <S%H954>feel<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H954>shame<s%> <S%H4480>Because<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5949>deeds<s%> By <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H6586>rebelled<s%> against Me; For <S%H227>then<s%> I will <S%H5493>remove<s%> from your <S%H7130>midst<s%> Your <S%H1346>proud,<s%> <S%H5947>exulting<s%> <S%H5947>ones,<s%> And you will <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5750><s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> be <S%H1361>haughty<s%> On My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

"But I will <S%H7604>leave<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you A <S%H6041>humble<s%> and <S%H1800>lowly<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> And they will <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"The <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H9390>wrong<s%> And <S%H1696>tell<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3577>lies,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> will a <S%H9652>deceitful<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> Be <S%H4672>found<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouths;<s%> For they shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> and <S%H7257>lie<s%> <S%H7257>down<s%> With <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> to make them <S%H2729>tremble.<s%>"

<S%H7442>Shout<s%> for <S%H7442>joy,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion!<s%> <S%H7321>Shout<s%> [in triumph,] O <S%H3478>Israel!<s%> <S%H8055>Rejoice<s%> and <S%H5937>exult<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> [your] <S%H3820>heart,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem!<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5493>taken<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> [His] <S%H4941>judgments<s%> against you, He has <S%H6437>cleared<s%> <S%H6437>away<s%> your <S%H340>enemies.<s%> The <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> is in your <S%H7130>midst;<s%> You will <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H9563>disaster<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> it will be <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> "Do not be <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> O <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> Do not let your <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H7503>fall<s%> <S%H7503>limp.<s%>

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is in your <S%H7130>midst,<s%> A <S%H3467>victorious<s%> <S%H1368>warrior.<s%> He will <S%H7797>exult<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you with <S%H8057>joy,<s%> He will be <S%H2790>quiet<s%> in His <S%H160>love,<s%> He will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you with <S%H7440>shouts<s%> of <S%H7440>joy.<s%>

"I will <S%H622>gather<s%> those who <S%H3013>grieve<s%> <S%H4480>about<s%> the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>feasts<s%> â€“ They <S%H1961>came<s%> from you, [O Zion;] [The] <S%H2781>reproach<s%> [of exile] is a <S%H4864>burden<s%> on them.

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H6213>deal<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%> With <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6031>oppressors,<s%> I will <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H6760>lame<s%> And <S%H6908>gather<s%> the <S%H5080>outcast,<s%> And I will <S%H7760>turn<s%> their <S%H1322>shame<s%> into <S%H8416>praise<s%> and <S%H8034>renown<s%> In <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

"At that <S%H6256>time<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you in, Even at the <S%H6256>time<s%> when I <S%H6908>gather<s%> you together; <S%H3588>Indeed,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H8034>renown<s%> and <S%H8416>praise<s%> Among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> When I <S%H7725>restore<s%> your <S%H7622>fortunes<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%>" <S%H559>Says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
